whitebox.parallel

Class Parallel

  • java.lang.Object
    • whitebox.parallel.Parallel

  • public class Parallel
extends java.lang.Object
    A Java Parallel for SMP [24-Jan-13] This class is under development and its parallel methods should be used with caution, if at all. In the near term, it is chiefly being used to provide a place where plugins with parallel algorithms may find out how many processors to use (e.g., how many threads to create). That limit is managed by the Timing Profiler window that can be popped up from the main GUI's Tools menu. Ordinary users will not care to use this tool, thus parallelized plugins will utilize all available processors by default.
